title: Elon Musk describes Starship flight as ‘roughly what I expected’
description: The flight termination system took too long to destroy the rocket, Musk said, and the pad needs to be reinforced with steel.

title: He blew the whistle on Trump’s Truth Social. Now he works at Starbucks.
description: “It’s an honest day’s work,” he says about the $16 an hour job, the ony work he's found since he was fired from the Trump Media platform he helped found.

title: Twitter founder Jack Dorsey says Musk wasn’t an ideal leader after all
description: The former CEO issued his strongest criticism yet of Musk's takeover of the social media site.
